lead_paragraph: A lack of surveillance cameras has hampered the investigation into the stabbing deaths that occurred during an early morning altercation on the No. 2 train.
snippet: A lack of surveillance cameras has hampered the investigation into the stabbing deaths that occurred during an early morning altercation on the No. 2 train.

headline.main: After 3 Days, Police Give Description of Subway Killer
headline.seo: New York Police Give Description of Subway Killer
